main event: Mr. observed unidentified aerial objects near Adams Field in Little Rock, Arkansas on March 12, 1950.
interesting points: The observer was in a plane at 500 feet when they saw the objects., The objects were initially perceived as large planes and were dark against the setting sun., The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes., The objects executed a sudden 90Â° turn during flight., The observer is described as honest, reliable, and has extensive flying experience.
sighted object: 6 to 18 dark round or octagonal objects in the sky
witness description: Mr. Observer from Flight Operations, experienced pilot with approximately 20 years of flying.
